LanguageData.PsychicSensitizer.label: magical sensitizer
LanguageData.PsychicSensitizer.description: This brain implant stimulates mana pathways in the brain, increasing magical aptitude.
LanguageData.PsychicReader.description: Gives limited mind-reading ability, improving the user's ability to get the upper hand in negotiations and social situations. The effect is proportional to the user's magical aptitude.
